'''Smooth red sandstone stairs''' are a [[smooth red sandstone]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Smooth red sandstone stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.
